Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."SP_ONLINEBILLPRINT02CLIENTS" ( in_location IN VARCHAR2, emplycodeinit VARCHAR2, reprint VARCHAR2, invcreditmemo NUMBER, rows_ NUMBER, RC1 IN OUT SP_ONLINEBILLPRINT02CLIENTSPkg.RCT1 ) AS location GLOBALPKG.STRING; StoO_selcnt INTEGER; StoO_error INTEGER; StoO_rowcnt INTEGER; StoO_crowcnt INTEGER := 0; StoO_fetchstatus INTEGER := 0; StoO_errmsg GLOBALPKG.STRING; StoO_sqlstatus INTEGER; printedflag NUMBER(5,0); /** Modifications madeto this proc must also be made to procs: sp_onlinebillprint02clientsf1 ****/ BEGIN /* Called From: Procedure :- Trigger :- PMD TransactionId :- WMD ActionId :- Modified By : Tarun Modified Date : 07/25/2001 */ sp_onlinebillprint02clients.location := sp_onlinebillprint02clients.in_location; IF sp_onlinebillprint02clients.rows_ = 50 THEN NULL; ELSE IF sp_onlinebillprint02clients.rows_ = 100 THEN NULL; ELSE IF sp_onlinebillprint02clients.rows_ = 200 THEN NULL; END IF; END IF; END IF; IF sp_onlinebillprint02clients.reprint = 'Y' THEN sp_onlinebillprint02clients.printedflag := 1; ELSE sp_onlinebillprint02clients.printedflag := 0; END IF; IF sp_onlinebillprint02clients.location = ' ALL' THEN sp_onlinebillprint02clients.location := NULL; END IF; IF sp_onlinebillprint02clients.invcreditmemo = 0 THEN BEGIN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = sp_onlinebillprint02clients.emplycodeinit AND projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND UPPER(SUBSTR(invoiceheader.invoiceno, 1, 5)) != 'MATCH' AND invoiceheader.printed = sp_onlinebillprint02clients.printedflag ) AND clntsupp.locationid = NVL(sp_onlinebillprint02clients.location, clntsupp.locationid) AND clntsupp.status_type = 1 UNION ALL SELECT ' ALL', '' FROM DUAL; END; ELSE IF sp_onlinebillprint02clients.invcreditmemo = 1 THEN BEGIN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = sp_onlinebillprint02clients.emplycodeinit AND projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND UPPER(SUBSTR(invoiceheader.invoiceno, 1, 5)) != 'MATCH' AND invoiceheader.printed = sp_onlinebillprint02clients.printedflag AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' ) AND clntsupp.locationid = NVL(sp_onlinebillprint02clients.location, clntsupp.locationid) AND clntsupp.status_type = 1 UNION ALL SELECT ' ALL', '' FROM DUAL; END; ELSE IF sp_onlinebillprint02clients.invcreditmemo = 2 THEN BEGIN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = sp_onlinebillprint02clients.emplycodeinit AND projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND UPPER(SUBSTR(invoiceheader.invoiceno, 1, 5)) != 'MATCH' AND invoiceheader.printed = sp_onlinebillprint02clients.printedflag AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'C' ) AND clntsupp.locationid = NVL(sp_onlinebillprint02clients.location, clntsupp.locationid) AND clntsupp.status_type = 1 UNION ALL SELECT ' ALL', '' FROM DUAL; END; END IF; END IF; END IF; END sp_onlinebillprint02clients;
